title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching between perspectives, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state. However, a view that is maximized should stay maximized.
OB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state

1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Double click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Return to the Java perspective.
